Package util

Class DataReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.DataReader
  • public class DataReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads the map files, the tile-set file and the file lists.

      • getTileSet

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Tile> getTileSet​(java.lang.String fileName)
                                                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                   javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                                                   org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Returns HashMap<Integer, Tile> extracted from the tile-set file from the /maps directory. Uses createDocFromFile() method to create Document from the given file, so it can be read.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the tile-set file.
        Returns:
        the HashMap<Integer, Tile> containing pairs of tile types and the number which represent them in the files of the maps which use the tile-set given as the parameter.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        See Also:
        createDocFromFile(String)

      • getMapData

        public Tile[][] getMapData​(java.lang.String mapFileName,
                           java.lang.String tileSetFileName)
                    throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                           org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                           java.io.IOException
        Returns a Tile[][] array representing the map given as the parameter. Uses getIntData() and getTileSet methods to read the map and the tile-set files and then converts the int[][] array from the map file into a Tile[][] array using the HashMap from the tile-set.
        Parameters:
        mapFileName - the name of the map file which is to be read and converted into Tile[][] array.
        tileSetFileName - the name of the tile-set file which is to be used to 'translate' the numbers in the map file to values of the enum Tile.
        Returns:
        2d Tile array representing the map given as the parameter.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        getIntData(String), getTileSet(String), Tile

      • getListOfFiles

        public java.lang.String[] getListOfFiles​(java.lang.String fileList)
        Returns a String[] array containing all file names from the given text file.
        Parameters:
        fileList - the name of the file to be read.
        Returns:
        the String[] array containing all file names from the given file.
